hero.title: Full-Stack Developer specializing in Cybersecurity
hero.tagline: I build secure, scalable applications with clean architecture and production-grade engineering. Former Tech Lead specializing in backend development, DevOps, and security hardening.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I'm a Cybersecurity Engineer with a Master's degree from Université de Grenoble-Alpes and 4+ years of experience building secure, scalable applications. As a former Tech Lead & DevOps at Black Pearl, I led technical teams, architected production systems, and implemented security-first engineering practices.
about.p2: My expertise spans full-stack development, system design, and security hardening. I'm passionate about clean architecture, automated testing, and building systems that scale.
about.p3: When I'm not writing code, I'm exploring new tools and staying ahead of the latest in cybersecurity and software engineering.

communication.name: Communication
communication.details: Effective verbal and written communication skills

resilience.details: Maintain performance under pressure and recover from setbacks

spa.title: Simple Portfolio App
spa.description: A full-stack financial portfolio management application demonstrating polyglot backend architecture, clean architecture with DDD, Kubernetes deployment, 85%+ test coverage, and security-first design with JWT auth and OWASP Top 10 compliance.
spa.demonstrates: Full-stack development, DevOps, Security hardening, Clean Architecture, Polyglot programming

chronolobe.title: ChronoLobe
chronolobe.description: A full-stack task management application focused on productivity, with a responsive user interface, modular backend architecture, and real-time performance tracking.
chronolobe.demonstrates: Full-stack development, DevOps, Modular backend architecture

blackpearl.description: Led technical teams across internal and external projects. Sat at the executive commitee. Architected and deployed production systems, implemented SIEM and security hardening practices, and reduced operational costs through automation.
blackpearl.tech: Java, Python, Go, JavaScript, Kubernetes, Docker, AWS

lynred.description: Integrated cybersecurity tools in defense systems. Conducted threat and vulnerability assessments, developed secure IT environments, and implemented security monitoring solutions.

rpa.description: Developed scalable REST APIs with Node.js, managed Debian servers and Nginx configuration, and optimized MongoDB databases for production workloads.

lim.description: Researched and implemented time series denoising techniques using machine learning algorithms. Designed experimental protocols with 1-NN algorithm and documented findings in a comprehensive LaTeX research report.
lim.tech: Python, numpy, pandas, matplotlib, scikit-learn, LaTeX

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities, challenging projects, and collaborations. Whether you need a backend engineer, a security consultant, or a tech lead, let's talk.

footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and shadcn/ui
